definition: Longhu district of Shantou city 汕头市, Guangdong
dragon/CL:條|条[tiao2]/imperial
surname Long
lake/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]
Longhu district of Shantou city 汕头市, Guangdong

sentences.english: "Haicai Tune" of the Yi Nationality got its name from a sea-vegetable in Yilong Lake.
sentences.chinese: 石屏彝族“海菜腔”是从异龙湖中的海菜而得名的。

sentences.english: Lake Natron is one of the largest soda lakes in the Rift valley.
sentences.chinese: 纳特龙湖是大裂谷中最大的碱湖之一。

sentences.english: Longhu creates a new kind of and a harmonious neighbor relationship.
sentences.chinese: 龙湖创造了全新和谐的邻里关系。

sentences.english: Longfor Century uses unique architectural language and paramount height.
sentences.chinese: 龙湖世纪以独特的建筑语言和巅峰高度。

sentences.english: The paper states the design of the trestle protection of foundation pit of intercepting trunk in Longhugou regulation in Santou City.
sentences.chinese: 阐述汕头市龙湖沟整治中截污干管的基坑支护设计。

sentences.english: The environment around Dragon Lake was nice.
sentences.chinese: 龙湖周围的环境真不错。

sentences.english: The tourist areas of Elder Peak, Yangyuanshi (Male Stone) and Xianglong Lake in the Danxia Scenic Spot Area are open to the public.
sentences.chinese: 丹霞景区中外开放的有长老峰，阳元山，和翔龙湖。

sentences.english: This pic was in the bank of Dragon Lake in east area of Zhengzhou.
sentences.chinese: 这张照片是在郑东新区的龙湖岸边。

sentences.english: Longhu, for example, froze its open market land sales in the second quarter.
sentences.chinese: 例如，龙湖，冻结了在第二季度公开市场土地的销售。
